post.title: Should Ruqqus add user flairs?

author.bio: Everyone's favorite fool and Joan of Arc fanboy.
author.bio_html: Everyone's favorite fool and Joan of Arc fanboy.

body: Nah. Sure wouldn't mind if enhancement suites (like, say, +RuqES) did so, though, as a personal and private tagging system (like Reddit Enhancement Suite).
body_html: Nah. Sure wouldn't mind if enhancement suites (like, say, +RuqES) did so, though, as a personal and private tagging system (like Reddit Enhancement Suite).

body: I think it should be a guild setting. They can actually be very useful for members of a community like +PoliticalCompassMemes, or even just as jokes.
